title: Privacy Policy
intro: Welcome to our Privacy Policy page. Your privacy is critically important to us.

content.heading: Information We Collect
content.text: We collect various types of information in connection with the services we provide, including name, email address, etc.

content.heading: How We Use Your Information
content.text: We use the information we collect to provide, operate, and improve our services.

content.heading: Your Data Protection Rights
content.text: You have the right to request access to your personal data, as well as the right to rectify, erase, or restrict its processing.
